description:
As a professional sexologist for more than 10 years I know the importance for couples to maintain a healthy relationship.  With everyone’s busy lives, sometimes we forget the simple pleasures that can be experienced between lovers besides only love making.

This course is not only for husbands and wives, but also for any man wanting to know more about how to give a woman a sensual massage.

My course, How to Give a Woman a Sensual Massage, will instruct any man with a basic understanding where a woman likes to be massaged, how and what additional components can be added to enhance the overall experience.

Using a live model, I will demonstrate how she should lay, and where the man should position himself.  Areas of the body to massage are taught, and with specific examples I will show how to place hands and where to rub.

Along the way, I explain why certain things are done and will also help you avoid common mistakes.

In addition I will talk about and demonstrate how to apply a massage oil.
title: How to Give a Woman a Sensual Massage
